snippet.title: DF CONNECTED v2.8.0 | UNDEREVENT 2023 TRAILER
snippet.description:
NOTICE: Read the January 2024 Progress Report over on GameJolt for an update on the game's progress, as well as information regarding a change to our release plans:
https://gamejolt.com/p/january-2024-progress-report-read-inside-for-an-announceme-3zhqkacc
______________________________

DF CONNECTED is an online multiplayer Undertale/Deltarune fangame, where you can rediscover the Underground and beyond ONLINE with your friends! Explore reimagined locations from the original games, choose from over 60+ playable characters, battle familiar and new foes, and meet new friends from around the world!

This trailer showcases a few of the major additions coming in the next update, v2.8.0! This update is planned to release in January 2024!

Check out the game here: https://gamejolt.com/games/dontforget/150752

TRAILER CREDITS:
- Directed by RickyG
- Editing by Landimizer
- Intro Artwork and Reveal Illustration by Prima
- Thumbnail Artwork by Zomboti
- Music by 3DSquared, Perpetrator, and Paledoptera
- (For full game credits, see the GameJolt page!)
